articles.author: https://www.facebook.com/bbcnews
articles.title: Musk's Doge exit live: Donald Trump and Telsa CEO to speak from White House - BBC
articles.description: The tech billionaire led the Department of Government Efficiency on a mission to dramatically cut federal spending which saw thousands of jobs axed.
articles.content:
Mike Wendling
In praising the work of Doge, President Trump ran down a typical mismash of fact and spin.
He claims that Elon Musk has stopped "fraud-slash-waste",
but theres little evidence of any… [+996 chars]

articles.author: Ryan Whitwam
articles.title: The Gmail app will now create AI summaries whether you want them or not - Ars Technica
articles.description: Workspace users will be seeing a lot more of Google’s AI summaries soon.

articles.author: John Timmer
articles.title: Researchers study extinct hominins using enamel proteins from their teeth - Ars Technica
articles.description: We weren’t even sure if Paranthropus remains come from a single species.
